title: Secret of the Skull Temple
author: abbath81
body:
Note: Level package updated on May 1, 2022

Deep into rocky mountains something precious is hidden for thousands of years and Lara Croft is on the way to find out. But she has to confront her biggest fears and be ready for the impossible if she wants to survive! ... Some places better stay uncharted ...

mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Jump back the way you came and hop down to the pillar,

normal'>Small Cog #1</b> from the bottom. Get air, swim into the tunnel S, left
and around a corner. Left again and in the end of that tunnel is <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Shotgun ammo</b>. Roll and swim back<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>. <u1:p></u1:p></i></span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

color:#000099;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>For a Secret, look up there for a tiny
tunnel right, at the ceiling, get in there and climb out to claim </span><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Keep swimming left and near the end of that tunnel go

normal'>Small Cog #2</b>. Drop down and go E, into the next cave and up N into

mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Now go to the W end of the valley, left is the pillar
with the face, on top of the pillar are <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Uzi
clips</b>, you can jump grab up there from a slope behind it. Drop down, go to
the W <span class=GramE>slopes</span> and follow to the N and left is some </span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-US style='font-size:14.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-ansi-language:EN-US'>Shotgun
ammo</span></b><span lang=EN-US style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;
font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-ansi-language:EN-US'> under a plant. In

line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Head W keeping along the <span class=GramE>right hand</span>

In the back is a rock you can pull aside to get the <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>Shotgun ammo</b> and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Pistol
clips</b> from underneath. In the S wall is a crawlspace, grab up to a slope,
shimmy to the right and pull up, back flip and jump back with a right curve to
end up at a gate. <span class=GramE>Theres</span> one torch that has to be
ignited, so keep it in mind, well be back. Hop up into the opening left of the

fern left, <span class=GramE>youll</span> reach another plateau, grab up right

to the lower floor, shoot the pots NW and grab <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>Shotgun ammo</b>. Now go use the floor lever in the other end of the
room, a hatch <span class=GramE>opens up</span>. Shoot the two Natives of which
one will drop a <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Crowbar</b>. Go up to
the higher floor again, up the chain there (7 grabs from the floor) and back
flip onto a ledge. Hop to the break tile and jump to grab the ladder under the
hatch you opened. Back flip off and in the corner left of the window is a
contraption that proves to be a Crowbar lever. It will open a gate* near where
we got the Shotgun. Shoot the pots right for <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>Pistol clips</b>.</span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Go down the ladder to the bottom and back flip off,

normal'> </i>Go E and just before the little tree below right, drop down to the

grass on that ledge and grab up (W) again to the upper plateau.<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'> </i></span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><u1:p></u1:p>Go W and drop down to a lower ledge,
first hop to a fern NE to get <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Pistol
clips</b>, hop <span class=GramE>back</span> and run jump over to grab the

style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>, the <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Valley

mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><u1:p> </u1:p></span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
color:#000099;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>From the second flatter part, turn left
and hop over the steep part to the path W, walk around to </span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:red;mso-ansi-language:
EN-GB'>Secret #3</span></b><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:
115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:red;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'> </span><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
color:#000099;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>(7), a <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>Mountain Dragon</b>. Walk back and hop E. <u1:p></u1:p></span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Face N and hop around the <span class=GramE>right hand</span>
side where you can grab up even higher to a ledge above. Go up to the top.<u1:p></u1:p></span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>From the top of the rock, run jump N and grab a crack
in the hanging rock. Go left around to a ladder, down and back flip to the
ledge N. Two Timed levers there and along the E wall are ledges with spikes and
a burner. The left lever shuts down a burner in the S end of the cave. Pull
left, get to the other one <span class=GramE>fast</span> and use it, roll and
time the popping spikes on the first ledge to jump to it and do a running jump
to the burner ledge, a hop to the grassy ledge and wait a bit to time the
spikes, run jump to the ledge and sprint through the second burner at the S
wall. Hop up into the SW corner and grab up to a crack, shimmy right and pull
up for <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Revolver ammo</b>. Drop down and
run jump N, once more and you are at a Zip-line through the Angel cave. Ride
the zip line and run through the dark tunnel<u1:p></u1:p></span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><u1:p> </u1:p></span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:#C45911;mso-themecolor:
accent2;mso-themeshade:191;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Level 4  Dino Temple.</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
color:blue;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'> </span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><u1:p></u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>3 Secrets.<u1:p></u1:p></span><span style='font-size:
10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
color:#000099;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Go left and in the corner from the high
ground you can grab the monkey climb ceiling, follow to the end and then up the
vines to get </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
color:red;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Secret #1</span></b><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
color:#000099;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'> (8), a <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>Sun Dragon</b>. Hang from the vines and back flip onto the ledge N.</span><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
color:blue;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'> </span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><u1:p></u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Without the <span class=GramE>Secret;</span> jump over
to the ledge N <u1:p></u1:p></span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:
115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Hang from the edge and shimmy right past the pillar to
get the <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Shotgun ammo</b> there. Go along
this ledge to the <span class=GramE>W, or</span> slide down somewhere and run
up the sloped cave, shoot 2 bats. When you emerge from the building, look up
left in the SE corner, <span class=GramE>theres</span> an opening well need
to go to later. Follow the valley and some tiny raptors attack. In the grass SW
are <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Pistol clips</b>.<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'> </i>Go around the corner into a foggy cave
and shoot some more raptors. In the fern in the den where they came from are <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Pistol clips</b>. <u1:p></u1:p></span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Jump
lever for the Temple Door.</span></b><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><u1:p> </u1:p></span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Head down N, near the bottom of the sloped path and
right around at the tree are <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Flares</b>,
two more tiny raptors attack, in the cavern they came from (N), are <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Uzi clips</b>. Another tiny <span
class=GramE>raptors</span> will show up. Go back up the slope SE a bit and left
around up a path, through a hole in the rock. At the end, near the small tree,
run jump up left around the corner onto a small ledge. Stand jump/grab the
ledge N, turn <span class=GramE>right</span> and run jump up onto the ledge E
(right a bit) and at the end of that are <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Pistol
clips</b>. <u1:p></u1:p></span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;
font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Without a Secret: Walk down S and run jump/grab the
plateau, shimmy right a bit and pull up.<u1:p> </u1:p></span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
color:#000099;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>With a Secret: From the Pistol clips go
back a bit and hop up right onto a corner ledge (NW), turn right and hop up NE,
walk right to the tree and stand jump SE to the fern, grab </span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:red;mso-ansi-language:
EN-GB'>Secret #2</span></b><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:
115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:#000099;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>
(9), the <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Valley Dragon</b>. Run jump as
far as you can to the S turning a bit left, so you can grab the edge of the
slope, shimmy right and at the end pull up and back flip/roll steering left to
land on the plateau (you may have to grab the edge, shimmy right and pull up).</span><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
color:blue;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'> </span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><u1:p></u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>From the SE corner of the plateau, jump/grab up to the
ridge E and shimmy right to a jump lever* hidden in a plant, the Temple door <span
class=GramE>opens up</span> (for later).<u1:p></u1:p></span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>The
Cave, Elephant Key, open the gate to the Uzis.</span></b><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
color:blue;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'> </span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><u1:p></u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Once more follow the path N, go up as before to grab
up to that ledge up N, step left a bit and grab up the rock face N. Go left,
hop up right to the dark ground against the rock face and proceed, seeking out
the spots where you can stand, to get to that yellow tree where Lara looks left
to where that Temple door opened. If you want a small <span class=SpellE>medi</span>,
slide down backwards just after the yellow tree and get down onto a ledge with
the <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>small <span class=SpellE>medipack</span></b>,
there are also <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Pistol clips</b> there.
Make your way back up by jumping to the ledge NE with a left curve and climb up
N again, go to the yellow tree. Follow the slopes carefully, there are more <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Pistol clips</b> in a fern right. At the W
end, hop down onto the ledge with the tree and grass. Walk down W and look
right around to spot a cave entrance, run jump down there and get in.</span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><u1:p></u1:p>Keep left and come to a red crystal and a
stack of crates, go left behind those and crawl through for <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Shotgun ammo</b> and a <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>small <span class=SpellE>medipack</span></b>.<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'> </i>Crawl out, keep left into a part with light coming in from above.
Grab up N from the mound and hop up right into the corner where you can just
stand, grab up to a crack N and go left to the far end. Drop and slide a bit,
then back flip roll onto a ledge. From the ledge run jump E and get up into the
niche for the <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Elephant Key</b>. Back
down onto the ledge and jump N onto the flat part where you came up, drop down.<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'> </i>Go E to another red crystal, but just
before you get there, <span class=GramE>youll</span> find a crawlspace left.
Inside go left, pick up <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Uzi clips</b>
and shoot the tiny raptors. Now go to the other end, walk slowly through the
spikes and around the spike trap in the floor to use a floor lever opening a
gate (underneath the <span class=GramE>Gold</span> door). Go back and crawl out.<u1:p></u1:p></span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
color:#000099;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>For a Secret, go straight to that grass
S, crawl underneath the rock and get</span><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:
14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-ansi-language:
EN-GB'> <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='color:red'>Secret
#2</span></b><span style='color:#000099'> (10), the <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>Mountain Dragon</b>.</span></span><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:
10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:blue;mso-ansi-language:
EN-GB'> </span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><u1:p></u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Head straight S and right/left to the cave entrance.
Slide down backwards and go SW to that skeleton, get the <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>Uzi clips</b>, hold Ctrl so Lara picks up the <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>Shogun ammo</b> after the cut-scene, shoot the Raptors. Then go into
that Raptor lair (SW), climb up the ridge and grab up left (W), shimmy left and
pull up at the corner to get <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Revolver
ammo</b>. Drop out, <span class=GramE>roll</span> and run out.</span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><u1:p></u1:p>The
Uzis.</span></b><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;
font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:blue;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'> </span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><u1:p></u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Go E to the Temple wall, SE near the tree are <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Pistol clips</b>, go to the left corner
(NE) and go down onto a lower ledge. Hop to the corner of the rock and then to
the grassy ledge E, follow right around to a tree and hop up W through the gap
between tree and wall. In the grass on top of the rock are <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>Uzi clips</b>. Go down N and safety drop from the ledge. Go under the
Temple where that gate opened, go <span class=GramE>in</span> and get the <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Uzis</b>.<u1:p></u1:p></span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Into
the Temple.</span></b><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:
115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:blue;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'> </span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><u1:p></u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Go out and right around, go up the dark slope (SE) to
the foggy cave, left around the structure and at the E end where you have the
cave left, look up right to spot a crawlspace in the corner.<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'> </i>Grab up there and crawl in to find a
ladder, climb up and right. Pick up a <span class=SpellE><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>Medipack</b></span> and run jump with a left curve down to the grassy
ledge left, go along that ledge, I thought a shimmy was the easiest because of
all the steep parts. <span class=GramE>Youll</span> reach the W side hills. In
the first fern are <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Pistol clips</b>.
Head S into a cave and shoot two tiny raptors, theres a spike trap in there,
so keep hugging the <span class=GramE>right hand</span> wall and in the back
are <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Uzi clips</b>.<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'> </i></span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:
"Verdana",sans-serif'><u1:p></u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Go back out minding those spikes and loop left up the
rocky path SW and then right passing through the gap N, keep left along the
upper slopes and through a tunnel where <span class=GramE>youll</span> find
more <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Pistol clips</b>. Out the other end
and down the slope a bit, to the left and run jump over a steep part to the N
to find <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Grenades</b> and <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Revolver ammo</b> there.<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'> </i><span class=GramE>Thats</span> it for
this side, turn back, jump back over the steep part (or grab the edge in case
you miss the jump and shimmy left to a niche below and pull up there).<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'> </i>Go S along the left side of that big
rock (with the tunnel) to the rock SE and keep going E along the high part of
the cliff that connects to the Temple. At the trees do a hop down left (NE) to
the stone path underneath the trees, walk forward and hop over the steep part
to the Temple wall. Follow the ledge N and in the second niche are <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Pistol clips</b>. Go back and use the slope
S to back flip/jump and grab the vegetation under the ledge above. Go to the
end and around the corner you can drop. E and around the corner are some <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Flares</b>, then enter a Puzzle room in the
Temple (the <span class=GramE>Gold</span> door was opened by the jump lever*
earlier). A flyby will show you symbols on wall and ceiling.</span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><u1:p></u1:p>Colour
Symbol Puzzle.</span></b><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:
115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:blue;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'> </span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><u1:p></u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Make a note of the symbols (the 3) on the wall next to
the two gates S and the one on the ceiling (the 4). <span class=GramE>Theres</span>
a block in the W wall, pull it out and aside to get a clue. Use the block to
get up to the ledge above and vases NW have <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>Pistol clips</b>, the ones NE a <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>small
<span class=SpellE>medipack</span></b>. <u1:p></u1:p></span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Get back down and find the two spots where the symbol
clue on the ceiling connects with the symbol clue on the wall (there are two
instances, one for the left wall clue and one for the right wall clue), get it
right and the bottom gate S <span class=GramE>opens up</span>. Before you
leave, pull that block out of the wall for a Timed run later (in case you
pushed it back in).<u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;

v:shapes="Grafik_x0020_3"><![endif]></span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Go through the gate, nothing in the vases, but 3 tiny
raptors come greet you.<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'> </i>Out E and
down to the right is the cave where we passed through <span class=GramE>before,
but</span> run over the ledge SE and shoot vases for <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>Flares</b>. Go back and out N, over the ledge left (shoot a raptor) to
get <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Uzi clips</b> from the fern left.
Back inside and open the gate E with the Elephant Key. Vases left have <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Uzi clips</b> and on the pedestal in the
back is a nice little bonus, the <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Grenade
Gun</b>. Walk back out and from the steps you can do a run jump and grab a thin
ledge up W. Go to a spike trap.<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'> </i>Time
the popping spikes and run on when they go down, immediately walk slow through
the static spikes and go to the Timed lever. Pull, <span class=GramE>roll</span>
and walk through the spikes, run to the end of the ledge, roll and grab the
edge to drop down, sprint W and right through the gate to the Puzzle room, jump
on the block, onto the ledge and get through the Timed gate S. Run over the
rock bridge, into the dark tunnel and slide down<u1:p></u1:p></span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:#C45911;mso-themecolor:
accent2;mso-themeshade:191;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Level 5  Kings Lair.</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
color:blue;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'> </span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><u1:p></u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>2 Secrets<u1:p>. </u1:p></span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Turn around at the end of the tunnel and do a safety
drop down to the valley floor.<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'> </i>Turn <span
class=GramE>left<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>(</span>N) and go to
the corner, left around into a narrow gorge, step down into the lower part and
shoot a couple of tiny raptors, notice the gate W and go back, climb up the
ridge and turn right to grab up to the steep block. Pull up and back flip to a
ledge, walk up E a bit and turn right at the point where you can run jump and
grab the rock S. Walk left a bit and turn left, run <span class=GramE>jump</span>
and grab the plateau E. Walk up to the E wall and turn left.<u1:p></u1:p></span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Opening
the Gates.</span></b><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;
font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:blue;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'> </span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><u1:p></u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>You can see a crack in the rock wall N, covered by
leaves. Run jump and grab that crack, go left around till you can pull up in a
cavern, shoot a tiny raptor and go get the <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Revolver
ammo</b> and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Pistol clips</b>, 2 more
raptors show up. Run jump out, landing back onto the plateau and run jump to a
ledge S, then jump into that opening S. Inside behind the crates are <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Flares</b> (you may have to duck), then get
through the blade trap W, run jump over to the W ledge and go to the right end
(pick up <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Uzi clips</b> from the grass<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>).</i> Run jump N landing on the far side of
that corner block, so you can jump off right and land on a rocky plateau, climb
up left and use the floor lever to open a gate*. Down to the plateau and run
jump SW with a right curve and Ctrl to land on the path in the rock face and
find another floor lever left, this one will open an underwater gate**. </span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><u1:p></u1:p>Safety drop from the side and you are in
front of a cave, first go right (E) to the pool and to the right are <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Pistol clips</b> in the grass. When you
dive into the tunnel under the waterfall, a Croc will emerge, go back to shoot
it. Enter again and swim left to the S wall, and down left into a tunnel where
that gate** opened, get the <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>2 boxes of
Grenades</b>. Back out and go get air.</span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
color:#000099;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><u1:p></u1:p>Swim back in, right/right
and in the far NE corner in a plant is</span><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:
14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-ansi-language:
EN-GB'> <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='color:red'>Secret
#1</span></b><span style='color:#000099'> (11), a <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>Valley Dragon</b>. NW are <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Uzi
clips</b>. Go back for air.</span></span><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:
10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:blue;mso-ansi-language:
EN-GB'> </span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><u1:p></u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Get out of the pool and right around to that cave <span
class=GramE>weve</span> been in before (from the other end) and in the W wall
is that open black gate*. Go through to the Valley with the Round Door. Left
around, at the yellow crystal is a box with <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>Shotgun ammo</b>. Left of the Round Door is a <span class=SpellE><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Medipack</b></span> and right (NW) are <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Grenades</b>. Ready yourself and throw that
lever to open the Door, a Big T-Rex (the King) comes out, stay close under his <span
class=GramE>belly</span> and shoot it. It will leave behind a <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Guardian Stone</b>.<span style='color:#000099'>
<u1:p> </u1:p></span></span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:
115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
color:#000099;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Go into the Kings Lair and all the way
in the back, in the grass is </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
color:red;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Secret #2 </span></b><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
color:#000099;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>(12), a <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>Mountain Dragon</b>.</span><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:10.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:blue;mso-ansi-language:
EN-GB'> </span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><u1:p></u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Back out and to the crates SE, <span class=GramE>just
right</span> of those is a hidden passage in the wall (vines), go through and
hop on a block right for Pistol clips. Then go use the Guardian Stone right of
the gate, go through<u1:p></u1:p></span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><u1:p> </u1:p></span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:#C45911;mso-themecolor:
accent2;mso-themeshade:191;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Level 6  The Skull Temple.</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
color:blue;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'> </span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><u1:p></u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>2 Secrets.<u1:p></u1:p></span><span style='font-size:
10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Hang out of the tunnel, drop/grab the crack and shimmy
left around into a cavern.<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'> </i>In the
passage NE is a Snake and in the cave behind that is a crate (right hand one)
with <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Pistol clips</b>. Back to the
cavern, run jump SW onto a ledge, standing on the higher ground, grab up to the
vegetation and go forwards to the edge and up a ladder to the cavern above.
Shoot a Snake and not the empty crate. Go through the tunnel S and at the edge
of the ravine, safety drop down onto a sloped rock, grab the edge. Pull up,
back flip <span class=GramE>roll</span> and grab the top of the very tall
pillar. Run jump E with a bit of a right turn to jump off and grab that crevice
right.<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'> </i>Get in and hang from the <span
class=GramE>right hand</span> side, shimmy right around to drop onto a ledge<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>.</i> First go W to get the <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Pistol clips</b> from the grass, turn back
and go through the crawlspace.<u1:p> </u1:p></span><span style='font-size:
10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
color:#000099;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>For a Secret: When you exit the tunnel,
turn around and grab up to the vines, climb up onto the ledge. In a fern is <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Shotgun ammo</b> and up on the ledge SW is </span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:red;mso-ansi-language:
EN-GB'>Secret #1</span></b><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:
115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:#000099;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>
(13), a <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Valley Dragon</b>. Get back down
and climb down the vines E.</span><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:10.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:blue;mso-ansi-language:
EN-GB'> </span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><u1:p></u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Run down to a lower ledge at the end of the path and
stand jump down onto the pillar N. Run jump onto the sloped pillar NW, just let
Lara slide onto the next one and then jump to get to the third, a last moments
jump to grab a ladder ahead. Go up to the ledge, left is a Timed Lever opening
a gate.<u1:p></u1:p></span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;
font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Pull, back flip/roll and run into the passage NE, at
the end grab up right and hop over a spike trap, grab up left to a crack, go
right around the corner and pull up right to where that gate is, get in quick.<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'> </i>Be careful once through the gate Run
jump to the far end of the dark ledge sliding off backwards and grab the edge,
find the crack below and drop/grab down, right around the corner to drop at a
long tunnel. Go up and you arrived at the Skull Temple. To the right you can do
a run jump up into a niche with <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Grenades</b>.
Back to the ledge and over the bridge.</span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><u1:p></u1:p>Open
the Big Door.</span></b><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:
115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:blue;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'> </span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><u1:p></u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>In the Skulls mouth is a <span class=GramE>Big</span>
door well have to open Go left (N) to the rock wall, hang from the edge of
the cliff (NW), <span class=GramE>drop</span> and grab the edge of the slope.<u1:p></u1:p></span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
color:#000099;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Detour for a Secret: Drop and slide/grab
once more, hanging from the edge <span class=GramE>youll</span> see an opening
below, pull up and let go, just after Lara passed the edge, use Ctrl to land
inside that opening. Climb up the roots in the back and shoot the two spiders
when going into the next room. Run over the corner of the break tile left (near
the ladder) to get to the pedestal. Grab </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:
"Verdana",sans-serif;color:red;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Secret #2</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
color:red;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'> </span><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:
14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:#000099;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>(14), a <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Mountain
Dragon</b>. Hop back into the pit where you broke the tile and get the <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Uzi clips</b>. Go up the ladder, back
flip/roll onto a slope, jump twice to get on a ledge with vases, there are <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Pistol clips</b> inside. Climb into the
tunnel W, safety drop out the other end. Hang from the edge of the cliff (NW), <span
class=GramE>drop</span> and grab the edge of the slope.</span><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
color:blue;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'> </span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><u1:p></u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Pull up and back flip/roll to grab a block, jump over
the gap and go up a ladder,<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'> </i>from the
top a back flip roll and a stand jump grab up to the next block. Grab up to the
vines, turn right near the outer edge and go forward to transfer to a ladder.
On top of the ledge go E and run jump over to the E ledge, through a crawlspace
and grab up left on the dark bricks, pull up, back <span class=GramE>flip</span>
and jump again to grab the passage above. Slide down and you are in the Eye of
the Skull. Slide down to the Nose and turn around to find a lever. That big
door in the Mouth <span class=GramE>opens up</span>. Slide forward down (N) and
grab the edge of the slope <span class=GramE>youll</span> land on to safety
drop down. Go through the Big Door and run into the darkness (into the <span
class=GramE>throat)</span></span><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:10.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:blue;mso-ansi-language:
EN-GB'> </span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><u1:p></u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;

line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

lang=EN-GB style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
color:blue;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'> </span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><u1:p></u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>The level is <span class=GramE>pretty linear</span>
once you know the route, this is how we did it<u1:p> </u1:p></span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Hop through the opening in the wall into the Main
Hall, look left and right for vases with <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Shotgun
ammo</b> and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Pistol clips</b>. NW is a
closed gate and when you go to the opening NE, a Horseman will come out. Upon
entering <span class=GramE>again</span> a second one will appear (or they may
attack together). For <span class=GramE>now</span> go straight through the
chains (theres a room right I chose to go to later and first go for items we
need and the general layout), to the far end and left around the corner is a
gate to a Lava room, above the gate is the <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>number
3</b>. Proceed through this passage and around the corner another Horseman
shows up. In the S end youll come to that closed gate we <span class=GramE>saw,</span>
you can open it with the chain (shortcut leading back to the Main Hall you can
use later). A Skeleton <span class=GramE>appeared,</span> you should have the
Grenade gun <span style='color:blue'>Otherwise you will have to take him along
with you to the next part where you can shoot him into a lava pit, or shoot him
in the head with the Revolver.</span></span><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:
10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:blue;mso-ansi-language:
EN-GB'> </span><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;
font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:red;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><u1:p> </u1:p></span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Horsemans
Gem 1.</span></b><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;
font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:blue;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'> </span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><u1:p> </u1:p></span></b><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Go through the opening <span class=SpellE>W in</span>
this passage, keep right to that purple light from a crystal and pick up more <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Grenades</b>. A Skeleton awakes. Going
back, go right around the wall with the claws to the S and another Skeleton
wakes up, you could take care of that one by shooting him down into the deep
lava room S. Go there, follow the ledge left around (mind the gap) to the back
and get a <span class=SpellE><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Medipack</b></span>
and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Uzi clips</b> from a higher ledge.
Return to the N and up N to the wall with the claws.</span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><u1:p></u1:p>Go left into a passage down into the
wall, go left down the slope, left is an empty vase. Go into the back and find
a burner with <span class=GramE><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Grenades</b></span>
underneath, time it right and you can both grab them and get through. A
Horseman appears and he leaves a <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Horsemans
Gem (1)</b>. Go left and in the <span class=GramE>far left</span> corner youll
find the gate with <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>number 6</b>. <u1:p></u1:p></span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>The
Block Puzzle, Horsemans Gems 2&3.</span></b><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
color:blue;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'> </span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><u1:p></u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Go out W and right around the corner, at the end of
the slope is a pool room right, the pool is empty <span class=GramE>Well</span>
do something about that later.<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'> </i>Go
straight and come to a hall with a push block. There are some vases, only the
one SW contains <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Shotgun ammo</b>.<u1:p></u1:p></span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
color:#000099;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Secret Detour: In the W wall are stone
carvings of Lions, go the left one of the 3 and grab up into a hidden passage,
crawl out onto the ledges above the Pool, to the right, hidden behind that
Phoenix statue is </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
color:red;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Secret #1</span></b><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
color:#000099;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'> (15), a <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>Mountain Dragon</b>. Go back to the Hall with the <span class=SpellE>Pushblock</span>
the way you came.</span><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:
115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:blue;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'> </span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><u1:p></u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
class=SpellE><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Pushblock</span></b></span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:
"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>.</span></b><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
color:blue;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'> </span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><u1:p></u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>On the floor are Fire tiles, they are <span
class=GramE>deadly</span> and the block has to go onto the skull. Push E once,
pull S once, push W once, pull W once, push S and move it onto the Skull. A
gate opens and two Horsemen show up, one leaves a <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>Horsemans Gem (2)</b>. Go down S into the next hall and a skeleton
wakes up.</span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:
"Verdana",sans-serif'><u1:p></u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Sword
Walk.</span></b><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;
font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:blue;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'> </span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><u1:p></u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>In the room down W, where that gate opened are Swords
on the ceiling waiting to kill you. Find the path to that pedestal in the <span
class=GramE>far left</span> corner and grab the <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>Horsemans Gem</b> <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>(3)</b>.
Behind the short column N are <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Uzi clips</b>,
you can take them after the Sword fell by crouching (sometimes not). Leave the
room, back to the hall with the <span class=SpellE>Pushblock</span> and up a
ladder in the <span class=GramE>far right</span> corner (NE). Back flip off.</span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><u1:p></u1:p>Follow the ledge to the S, shimmy around
the column, run jump/grab over the gap and get the Revolver ammo<span
style='color:#000099'>.</span> Go back to the ladder.</span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><u1:p></u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>The
Math Puzzle, opening the Gates.</span></b><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:
10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:blue;mso-ansi-language:
EN-GB'> </span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><u1:p></u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Up the slope and in the <span class=GramE>N</span>
wall is an opening, get in and grab up right. You are in a room with numbered
levers, in the left vase at the doorway are <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>Pistol clips</b>, all other vases are empty. In the central green
room is an equation on the wall, stepping on the clue tiles underneath will
show gate 3 and gate 6.<u1:p></u1:p></span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Gate
6, Lava Dungeon I.</span></b><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:10.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:blue;mso-ansi-language:
EN-GB'> </span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><u1:p></u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Each combination has the 4 as a constant, so the 4
(lever) can be pulled down and stays down. To get the 6 (easiest to go there
first) result we need 3/4/6.<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'> </i>You <span
class=GramE>can</span> step on the right hand clue tile under the equation to
see if it worked<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'> </i>Go out of the room
and left to the Main Hall, loop right around into the shortcut gate and then go
left, <span class=GramE>weve</span> been here, go straight down into the
sloped passage, right/right and right around the corner is gate 6.</span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
color:#000099;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><u1:p></u1:p>Just through the gate climb
up right into a crawlspace and down into the passage for </span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:red;mso-ansi-language:
EN-GB'>Secret #3</span></b><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:
115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:#000099;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>
(16), a <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Sun Dragon</b>. Get back out<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>.</i></span><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><u1:p> </u1:p></span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>From gate 6 follow the passage and come to a ledge
overlooking the Pool Hall. Run jump right into that opening in the wall. A huge
Lava Pit with break ledges, hop to the <span class=GramE>right hand</span>
corner of the first, a running jump curving left/right to the next so youll
have enough space on that one to do a running jump to the next, another curved
running jump onto #4 near that skull on the wall, side flip right into the gap
in the pillar.</span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:
"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><u1:p></u1:p>Hang from the far side and shimmy left
around to drop onto the bridge. Go to the W and run with a left curve from the
left side onto the break tile and run jump/grab the tile S. Pull up and quickly
run a bit forward, side flip left and stand jump forward to a lower tile, run
onto the next with a left curve to jump to the solid ledge on the S wall.<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'> </i>Here comes the hard part When above
the Lava, Lara will heat up, so be quick in your moves.</span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><u1:p></u1:p>Run jump to the tile N, a running jump
left to the tile series going <span class=SpellE>N</span>, near the end a sharp
curve right to jump to the tile E, curving right to the next, then a quick hop
to the last and another fast one into the opening in the wall<u1:p>. </u1:p></span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Boulder
Alley, Filling the Pool.</span></b><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:10.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:blue;mso-ansi-language:
EN-GB'> </span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><u1:p></u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Go right and a skeleton in the corner gives you fair
warning Up the slope some boulders are released, sprint back and around the
corner. Back up and right around is the next trap, keep ahead of then while
jumping over a pit and run left around the corner and come to something
similar, only upslope. If <span class=GramE>youre</span> fast enough, you can
jump/grab over the pit and wait it out. <span class=GramE>Youll</span> come to
a room with a gate and a lever right next to it. Pull the lever, it is #1 to
fill the pool, the gate also <span class=GramE>opens up</span>. Go through the
gate to the pool room and loop right around the pool to another gate you can
open with a Horsemans Gem. A Horseman comes out, shoot him. Inside the room is
lever #2 for the Pool. In the W end of the Pool room in a vase NW are <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Pistol clips</b>.<u1:p></u1:p></span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>The
Laser Skull, the Crystals Base.</span></b><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:
10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:blue;mso-ansi-language:
EN-GB'> </span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><u1:p></u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Hop into the pool, you can now reach that opening E,
go past that gate* and up left.<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'> </i>The
chain pulley in the back is to open that gate* you <span class=GramE>just saw,</span>
that gate is for later. Left is a room with a Laser Skull. Keeping close to the
wall, walk right (the entrance will close) and first grab the <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Revolver ammo</b> and have that gun ready
with the sight. Approach the Skull and it wakes up, maybe if <span class=GramE>youre</span>
fast, zoom in, you can shoot both eyes while hes charging up. <span
class=GramE>Otherwise</span> side flip and aim again. Go get the <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Crystals Base</b>, push the block SW to
the block in the niche, so you can pull that one out once. Go behind it and use
the chain pulley to <span class=GramE>open up</span> the entrance gate again.
Go out and right, over the block and left through the gate. <span class=GramE>Youll</span>
arrive back in the hall with the Push block puzzle. Go right around and to the
NE corner, up that ladder to the floor above, up the slope NW and into the
opening N, grab up right into the Math Room.</span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><u1:p></u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>For
Gate 3, Lava Dungeon II.</span></b><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:10.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:blue;mso-ansi-language:
EN-GB'> </span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><u1:p></u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Using levers 2/4/5 will give an outcome of 3, so 3
back up, 2 down, leave 4 as it is, pull 6 up and 5 down. Check the left skull
tile to see if gate 3 opened. Go out W, right into the chain alley and left in
the back to get to the now open gate 3. Stand against the left wall at the
edge, wait for the blade to pass and do a stand jump onto the nearest block,
run forward a bit and hop to the block near the axle the blade is turning on,
forward a bit and wait for the moment to hop over the blade to the next and
another <span class=SpellE>hıp</span> to the one S, landing on the right
hand side, so you can turn left and run jump (when the moment is there) to the
block E and stop at the far edge. Turn right and jump to get to the ledge S. Up
the ladder left and into a dark tunnel, grab up right and <span class=GramE>youll</span>
end up in the upper region of the Main Hall.<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>
</i>Hop over the gap to the beam and keep left to come to a gate you can open
with the 2 remaining Horsemans Gems (In case you came here with NO or not
enough Horsemans Gems, in the NE corner is a slope below the beam, so you can
drop own and go look for the items you missed. This would be the case if you
came through gate 3 before finding the Gems</span><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>).<u1:p></u1:p></span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Globe
Push Puzzle, the Orange Crystal.</span></b><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:
10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:blue;mso-ansi-language:
EN-GB'> </span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><u1:p></u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>There are 3 Push able Globes, in the S wall is a gate
and <span class=GramE>theres</span> a clue/riddle. The <span class=GramE>5
letter</span> word GLOBE of which 3 have coordinates behind them.<u1:p></u1:p></span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>After you figured it out, push the 3 Globes into place
(Seen from the SW corner, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>G</b>reen; 2
to the N and 4 to the E. <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>B</b>lue; 6 to
the N and 7 to the E. <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>O</b>range; 3 to
the N and 9 to the E).<u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;

lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span></span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>The gate S opens, get in and grab the <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Orange Crystal</b>, combine it with the
Crystals Base and obtain the <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Power
Crystal</b>. Go out W, right/left onto the beam, hop up W, jump W and then
right to the terrace. Loop around left to jump to the other beam and get to the
far S end (shimmy past columns). Jump/grabs up the blocks E and jump grab to
the high beam. Turn around and go up the ladder to place the Power Crystal
(face N). <u1:p></u1:p></span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;
font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Final
Battle for the Purple Moon Diamond.</span></b><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
color:blue;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'> </span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><u1:p></u1:p><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>The gate opens N, back down the ladder to the beam and
to the N end, safety drop down and jump over to the terrace N, go through that
gate. Pick up <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Grenades</b>, <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Revolver ammo</b>, a <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>small <span class=SpellE>medipack</span></b> and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>Uzi clips</b> from the 4 corners before laying your hand on the <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Purple Moon Diamond</b>. A Giant Guardian
storms into the room, he throws deadly gas at youShoot him a couple of times
and run away, look if he dropped and if not repeat <span class=GramE>till</span>
hes dead, when he freezes and doesnt aim at you anymore, hes about to drop<u1:p></u1:p></span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>When you approach the gate E after the battle, it will
open. Go in and slide down to end the adventure.<u1:p></u1:p></span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
